text: The 1962–63 Austrian Cup was Austria's nationwide football cup competition. FK Austria Wien were the defending champions.Austria Soccer == Round of 32== First round with teams from the first and second league. SV Wattens believed because of the cold in Wattens in the morning (-24 degrees) it cannot be played in Salzburg in the afternoon and did not travel at all. In Salzburg, the temperatures in the afternoon were just below 0 degrees and were therefore quite regular. Referee Marschall declared the place playable. The game was certified for Austria Salzburg. Herzogenburg did not play. SAK did not play. Replay matches: == Round of 16== == Quarter-finals == ==Semi-finals == == Final == *FK Austria Wien: Gernot Fraydl - Peter Vargo - Karl Stotz - Johann Löser - Alfred Gager - Horst Paproth - Waldemar Graciano - Johann Buzek - Horst Nemec - Johann Geyer - Walter Schleger coach: Edmund FrühwirthAustria Soccer * Linzer ASK: Helmut Kitzmüller - Alfred Teinitzer - Helmut Linossi - Heinz Oberparleiter - Gerhard Sturmberger - Rudolf Sabetzer - Gyula Szabo - Carlos Lima - Laszlo Nemeth - Paul Kozlicek - Ferdinand Zechmeister coaches: Josef Brunetzky/Karl Schlechta == References == Category:Austrian Cup Category:1960s in Austria
title: 1962–63 Austrian Cup
